trans-unit.source: Represents Abstract Syntax Notation One (ASN.1)-encoded data.
trans-unit.target: 代表抽象語法標記法 (一) (ASN.1) 編碼的資料。

trans-unit.source: Abstract Syntax Notation One (ASN.1), which is defined in CCITT Recommendation X.208, is a way to specify abstract objects that will be serially transmitted.
trans-unit.target: Abstract Syntax Notation One (ASN.1)，CCITT 建議 X.208 中定義，是指定抽象物件，會循序傳輸的方法。

trans-unit.source: The set of ASN.1 rules for representing such objects as strings of ones and zeros is called the Distinguished Encoding Rules (DER), and is defined in CCITT Recommendation X.509, Section 8.7.
trans-unit.target: ASN.1 規則，表示為字串和零的這類物件的一組稱為辨別編碼規則 (DER)，及區段 8.7 CCITT 建議 X.509 中定義。

trans-unit.source: These encoding methods are currently used by the cryptography namespace in the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 中的密碼編譯命名空間目前使用這些編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: Note that if an unknown data type is encountered while accessing an instance of this class, data is returned as a hexadecimal string.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，存取此類別的執行個體時遇到未知的資料類型時，資料仍會傳回做為十六進位字串。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> 類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> 類別。

trans-unit.source: A byte array that contains Abstract Syntax Notation One (ASN.1)-encoded data.
trans-unit.target: 內含使用 Abstract Syntax Notation One (ASN.1) 編碼資料的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> class using a byte array.
trans-unit.target: 使用位元組陣列初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> class using an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> 類別的執行個體，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor makes a copy of the specified <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> instance.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立一份指定的<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> 類別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asnEncodedData" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asnEncodedData" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A byte array that contains Abstract Syntax Notation One (ASN.1)-encoded data.
trans-unit.target: 內含使用 Abstract Syntax Notation One (ASN.1) 編碼資料的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> class using an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> object and a byte array.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> 物件和位元組陣列，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> 類別。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> information.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> 資訊的字串。

trans-unit.source: A byte array that contains Abstract Syntax Notation One (ASN.1)-encoded data.
trans-unit.target: 內含使用 Abstract Syntax Notation One (ASN.1) 編碼資料的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> class using a byte array.
trans-unit.target: 使用位元組陣列初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> 類別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> object to base the new object on.
trans-unit.target: 新物件所依據的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Copies information from an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> 物件複製資訊。

trans-unit.source: This method copies information to an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> object based on the specified <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會複製資訊<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData>物件根據指定<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData>物件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> 類別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asnEncodedData" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asnEncodedData" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the return string should contain carriage returns; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果傳回的字串應包含歸位字元，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a formatted version of the Abstract Syntax Notation One (ASN.1)-encoded data as a string.
trans-unit.target: 以字串的方式，傳回使用 Abstract Syntax Notation One (ASN.1) 編碼的資料之格式化版本。

trans-unit.source: A formatted string that represents the Abstract Syntax Notation One (ASN.1)-encoded data.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Abstract Syntax Notation One (ASN.1) 編碼資料的格式化字串。

trans-unit.source: Use this method if you need to print Abstract Syntax Notation One (ASN.1)-encoded data or output the information to a text box.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要列印 Abstract Syntax Notation One ASN.1 編碼的資料或輸出到文字方塊中的資訊，請使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the `multiLine` parameter to control the layout of the output.
trans-unit.target: 使用`multiLine`參數來控制輸出的版面配置。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> 類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> value for an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to provide information about the Abstract Syntax Notation One (ASN.1)-encoded data, such as the algorithm used to encrypt the data.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以用來提供 Abstract Syntax Notation One ASN.1 編碼資料，例如用來加密資料的演算法的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> 類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Abstract Syntax Notation One (ASN.1)-encoded data represented in a byte array.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定以位元組陣列表示的 Abstract Syntax Notation One (ASN.1) 編碼資料。

trans-unit.source: A byte array that represents the Abstract Syntax Notation One (ASN.1)-encoded data.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Abstract Syntax Notation One (ASN.1) 編碼資料的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: This property is the easiest way to access the information in an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是最簡單的方式存取的資訊<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData>物件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> 類別。

trans-unit.source: The value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 值為 <see langword="null" />。
